languages.text: "Идира... Пестрая пелена спала, и я наконец-то вижу за ней человека. Но что от него осталось? Бледная, бесцветная оболочка". {n}Рубиновые глаза полны сочувствия и печали.{/n} "Ее цвета тают на глазах, но я не в силах это остановить... Никто не в силах. Вскоре от псайкерши останется лишь серая тень".

traits.locale_text: "Идира... Пестрая пелена спала, и я наконец-то вижу за ней человека. Но что от него осталось? Бледная, бесцветная оболочка". {n}Рубиновые глаза полны сочувствия и печали.{/n} "Ее цвета тают на глазах, но я не в силах это остановить... Никто не в силах. Вскоре от псайкерши останется лишь серая тень".

languages.text: "Idira... The many-coloured veil has fallen off, finally revealing to me the person behind it. Yet what is left of that person? A pale, colourless shell." {n}Her ruby-red eyes are filled with compassion and sorrow.{/n} "Her colours are fading away quickly, and I am powerless to stop it... As is everyone. Soon a grey shadow will be all that is left of the psyker."

languages.text: “伊迪拉……她五颜六色的面纱已经落了下来，我终于看清了她真正的样子。然而，那个人还剩下什么呢？仅仅是个苍白、无色的躯壳罢了。”{n}卡西娅红宝石般的双眼中充满了怜悯和悲伤。{/n}“她的颜色正在迅速融化，而我无力阻止……每个人都是这样。用不了多久，那位灵能者就会只剩下灰暗的影子。”
languages.original_text: "Idira... The many-coloured veil has fallen off, finally revealing to me the person behind it. Yet what is left of that person? A pale, colourless shell." {n}Her ruby-red eyes are filled with compassion and sorrow.{/n} "Her colours are fading away quickly, and I am powerless to stop it... As is everyone. Soon a grey shadow will be all that is left of the psyker."

“伊迪拉……她五颜六色的面纱已经落了下来，我终于看清了她真正的样子。然而，那个人还剩下什么呢？仅仅是个苍白、无色的躯壳罢了。”{n}卡西娅红宝石般的双眼中充满了怜悯和悲伤。{/n}“她的颜色正在迅速融化，而我无力阻止……每个人都是这样。用不了多久，那位灵能者就会只剩下灰暗的影子。”

A pale, colourless shell." {n}Her ruby-red eyes are filled with compassion and sorrow.{/n} "Her colours are melting away quickly, and I'm powerless to stop it... As is everyone. Soon a grey shadow will be all that is left of the psyker."

languages.text: «Idira... El velo de colores ha caído, revelando a la persona que había detrás. Pero ¿qué queda de esa persona? Un cascarón pálido e incoloro». {n}Sus ojos de rubí están llenos de compasión y tristeza.{/n} «Sus colores se difuminan rápidamente y no puedo hacer nada para detenerlo... Ni yo ni nadie. Pronto solo quedará una sombra gris de la psíquica».
languages.original_text: "Idira... The many-coloured veil has fallen off, finally revealing to me the person behind it. Yet what is left of that person? Soon a grey shadow will be all that is left of the psyker."

traits.locale_text: «Idira... El velo de colores ha caído, revelando a la persona que había detrás. Pero ¿qué queda de esa persona? Un cascarón pálido e incoloro». {n}Sus ojos de rubí están llenos de compasión y tristeza.{/n} «Sus colores se difuminan rápidamente y no puedo hacer nada para detenerlo... Ni yo ni nadie. Pronto solo quedará una sombra gris de la psíquica».

languages.text: 「イディラ…色とりどりのベールがはがれ落ち、ついにその背後にいる人物が私の前に姿を現しました。ですが、その人物に残っているものは何か？青白い、色のない抜け殻」{n}彼女のルビーレッドの瞳は慈愛と悲しみに満ちていた。{/n}「彼女の色は急速に溶けていく。そして私にはそれを止めることはできません…誰もがそうなのです。やがて、異能者に残されるのは灰色の影だけとなるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Idira... The many-coloured veil has fallen off, finally revealing to me the person behind it. Yet what is left of that person? A pale, colourless shell." {n}Her ruby-red eyes are filled with compassion and sorrow.{/n} "Her colours are melting away quickly, and I'm powerless to stop it... As is everyone. Soon a grey shadow will be all that is left of the psyker."

languages.text: "Idira ... Der vielfarbige Schleier ist abgefallen und hat mir endlich die Person dahinter offenbart. Doch was ist von dieser Person noch übrig? Eine fahle, farblose Hülle." {n}Ihre rubinroten Augen sind voller Mitgefühl und Trauer.{/n} "Ihre Farben schmelzen schnell dahin, und ich bin machtlos dagegen ... Wie alle anderen auch. Bald wird von der Psionikerin nur noch ein grauer Schatten übrig sein."
languages.original_text: "Idira... The many-coloured veil has fallen off, finally revealing to me the person behind it. Yet what is left of that person? A pale, colourless shell." {n}Her ruby-red eyes are filled with compassion and sorrow.{/n} "Her colours are melting away quickly, and I'm powerless to stop it... As is everyone. Soon a grey shadow will be all that is left of the psyker."

languages.text: « Idira... Le voile aux mille couleurs est tombé et j'ai enfin pu voir qui se cachait derrière. Mais que reste-t-il de cette personne ? Une coquille pâle, dénuée de la moindre couleur. » {n}Vous lisez autant de compassion que de chagrin dans ses yeux rubis.{/n} « Ses couleurs ternissent à une vitesse alarmante et je ne peux rien faire pour l'empêcher... Personne ne peut faire quoi que ce soit. Bientôt, il ne restera de la psyker qu'une ombre grise. »
languages.original_text: "Idira... The many-coloured veil has fallen off, finally revealing to me the person behind it. Yet what is left of that person? Personne ne peut faire quoi que ce soit. Bientôt, il ne restera de la psyker qu'une ombre grise. »

languages.text: "İdira'nın üzerindeki renk cümbüşü örtü nihayet düştü, ardındaki kişiyi bana gösterdi. Peki o kişiden geriye ne kalmış? Solgun, renksiz bir kabuk." {n}Cassia'nın yakut kırmızısı gözleri, şefkat ve kederle dolu.{/n} "İdira'nın renkleri hızla eriyip gidiyor, bunu durdurmak içinse elimden hiçbir şey gelmiyor. Kimsenin gelmiyor. Yakında ruhsezerden geriye sadece ağarmış bir gölge kalacak."
languages.original_text: "Idira... The many-coloured veil has fallen off, finally revealing to me the person behind it. Yet what is left of that person? A pale, colourless shell." {n}Her ruby-red eyes are filled with compassion and sorrow.{/n} "Her colours are fading away quickly, and I am powerless to stop it... As is everyone. Soon a grey shadow will be all that is left of the psyker."

traits.locale_text: "İdira'nın üzerindeki rengârenk örtü nihayet düştü ve ardındaki kişi açığa çıktı. Peki o kişiden geriye ne kalmış? Solgun, renksiz bir kabuk." {n}Cassia'nın yakut kırmızısı gözleri, şefkat ve kederle dolu.{/n} "İdira'nın renkleri hızla eriyip gidiyor ve bunu durdurmak için elimden hiçbir şey gelmiyor... Kimsenin elinden hiçbir şey gelmiyor. Yakında bu ruhsezerden geriye sadece ağarmış bir gölge kalacak."
